question: Which of the following was the author of 'Tarikh-i-Firoz Shah' and 'Futwa-i-Jahandari'?
explanation: Firoz Shah Tughlaq patronised scholars like Barani. Barani was a famous historian who wrote Tarikh-i-Firoz Shah and Futwa-i-Jahandari. Firoz Shah Tughlaq himself wrote the Futuhat-e-firozshahi.
